Japanese text: あなたの名字を教えてくれる？
English text: Can you tell me your last name?

Japanese text: 誕生日と血液型も教えてね？
English text: Also, tell me your birthday and blood type, okay?

Japanese text: 藤崎詩織の誕生日と血液型は覚えてる？
English text: Do you remember Shiori Fujisaki's birthday and blood type?
